mapper.select: SELECT prcs_ing_code, prcs_dir_de_code, prod_code, find_prod_name(prod_code) AS prod_name, prcs_code, find_prcs_name(prcs_code) AS prcs_name, prcs_seq, input_amt, err_amt, prcs_amt, find_cdnm('0S', prcs_dir_ing_sts) AS prcs_dir_ing_sts FROM prcs_ing WHERE prcs_dir_de_code = #{prcsDirDeCode} AND prod_code = #{prodCode} ORDER BY prcs_seq

SELECT DISTINCT eq_code, eq_name, p.prcs_type, i.prcs_code FROM eq_equip e JOIN prcs_manage p ON e.prcs_type = p.prcs_type JOIN prcs_ing i ON p.prcs_code = i.prcs_code WHERE e.eq_sts='W' AND i.prcs_code = #{prcsCode}

SELECT find_prod_name(prod_code) AS prod_name, find_prcs_name(prcs_code) AS prcs_name, mp_code, find_mat_name(mp_code) AS mat_name, bom_amt * #{prcsDirAmt} AS bom_amt FROM v_mat_bom WHERE prod_code= #{prodCode} AND prcs_code = #{prcsCode}

SELECT prcs_list_code, prcs_dir_de_code, prod_code, prcs_code, eq_code, input_amt, err_amt, prcs_amt, prcs_start_time, prcs_end_time, emp_code FROM prcs_list WHERE prcs_dir_de_code = #{prcsDirDeCode} AND prcs_code = #{prcsCode}
